name: Damage Inc.: Metallica
summary:
Damaged Inc is a cancelled video game loosely based on the Heavy Metal band Metallica. Set in a post apocalypse future, the gameplay was meant to be an adventure vehicular combat action game in the vein of Twisted Metal.
It can be assumed that the soundtrack would have been provided by the band, as well as the member's likeness.
